overview: Gray everyday life, which is filled with insignificant meaningless events â€“ is the lot of most people. Of course, if the main event of the day is the act of masturbation in the shower, then, yes... tzhelo. So life is empty and uninteresting. But there comes, consciously, a moment that cannot be missed, overslept, wasted! Real life is a passion... There is nothing else... And you don't need to.
title: German Beauty
